review_data.title: Appealing service
review_data.content: Employees are rude, even to regular customers. The quality of the ingredients is low. Avoid if you can

review_data.title: Traditional Vietnam

review_data.title: Wie immer, sehr gutes Essen
review_data.content: Gutes Essen, freundlicher Setvice und angenehme Preise, ob zum Mitnehmen oder im Restaurant essen, einfach tiptop

review_data.title: Very delicious
review_data.content: I‘ve been there several times and the dishes were always tasty and delicious. I especially recommend their Bun cold noodle salad, Pho, Sze chuan and the Red curry. Very attentive and friendly personnel!

review_data.title: Ausgezeichnet

review_data.title: Selten
review_data.content: Es ist selten so ein authentisches asiatisches Lokal wie dieses noch in der Schweiz anzutreffen. Mit der Möberlierung fühlt es...More

review_data.title: Delicious Asian Kitchen
review_data.content: I‘ve been there many times. The food is delicious and authentic. The service is very kind. I would recommend this restaurant to everyone!

review_data.title: Pho
review_data.content: Super Bedienung. Grosse Auswahl an Menus: chinesisch, thai und vietnamesisch. Das Essen war sehr orginalgetreu und hatte ein gutes Aroma.

review_data.title: Hervorragend
review_data.content: Excellentes Essen und freundliche Bedienung, gerne wieder. Pho Suppe ist wirklich zu empfehlen und schmeckt sehr gut.

review_data.title: Great Experience
review_data.content: Starting by the waiters appearance, there was nothing to worry about. Had a pho with beef and rice noodles. My friends were satisfied as well and we would love to visit this cozy place again!

review_data.title: Kantinenatmosphäre
review_data.content: Mit der Atmosphäre einer Kantine und dem Blick aus dem Fenster unter die Hardbrücke, ist dieses Lokal keine Schönheit. Auch...More

review_data.title: Best Asia Restaurant in Zürich
review_data.content: This is the best asia Retaurant in Switzerland. They have Chinese, Thai and Vietnamnese Dishes which are all very delicious. I really recommend this place. Either you can have a Take Away or eat there. I recommend the Thai Curry and Sze Chuan.

review_data.content: Mittagsbuffet mit 5 Gerichten, immer frisch zubereitet, grosse Portionen für wenig Geld. Mann kann auch a la Catre bestellen, dies...More

review_data.title: PATHETIC...IS AN UNDERSTATEMENT
review_data.content: The most "Non Thai" and distasteful food.....that had no resemblance to "thai" in taste.... It was horrible... The couple running it were rude & arrogant as if they make the best Thai food....but it was nothing but bad food.... Don't go here.....save your money .....&...More

review_data.title: Asiatisches Fast Food

review_data.title: Fast and Unassuming Asian Food
review_data.content: Perfect place for a quick bite before going to the movies or clubs at Escher-Wyss Platz. Prices are okay for Zürich with decent portions and average taste.

review_data.title: Fastfood

review_data.title: Big portion and good taste
review_data.content: A small restaurant close to Escher-Wyss, not far from some nightlife entertainments and cinemas. Portions are quite concrete and the taste is good. A quick service if you are outside and waiting for action :)

review_data.title: Buon cinese/thailandese vicino cinema Abaton
review_data.content: Pietanze buone e abbondanti, locale con alcuni tavoli esterni/interni e da take away. Prezzi medi per Zurigo, interessanti quelli per...More

review_data.title: Abzockerei
review_data.content: Ein weiteres Beispiel für die in Zürich übliche Abzockerei. Das Essen ist weder lecker noch grosszügig bemessen. Gemüse fehlt und...More

review_data.title: Very decent Chinese but pricey
review_data.content: Ordered for the family - Tom Yum prawn soup with rice, Pad Thai noodle, Fried noodle with chicken. Food taste was delicious. Service was slightly above average, however total bill came up to CHF$74, which seem to be quite expensive. If you crave for Chinese...More

review_data.title: Overcharged
review_data.content: We stopped one evening before they close just to get white rice to go. A bowl of white rice = 5CHF. I don't know anything else about the restaurant but probably will never find out.
